doc:
Barbara Pepper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_Pepper 0 Barbara Pepper (born Marion B. Pepper; May 31, 1915 – July 18, 1969) was an American stage, television, radio, and film actress. She is best known as the first "Doris Ziffel" on the sitcom Green Acres. Barbara_Pepper ( born Marion_B._Pepper ; May_31_,_1915 – July_18_,_1969 ) was an_American_stage , television , radio , and film_actress . She is_best_known as the_first_"_Doris_Ziffel " on the_sitcom_Green_Acres .
